channel.title: War Coding Google Screensaver on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in War Coding Google Screensaver on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: lalala connect the dots..
item.description: Last night I released on eof my first GPLd software apps. It was fun. Check it out here. Hopefully it won’t kill my 3gscreensaver.com market. heh. whoops. Umm. I am tired again. I didn’t really get sleep. in fact I got the opposite of sleep. a kick in the head. stupid heads. I got some new buttons - one with mary, one with tux, one with a pentegram and one with some ready.
